description:
Nepremárnite už žiadnu príležitosť na knihu - s novou aplikáciou od Martinusu môžete čítať e-knihy a počúvať audioknihy kedykoľvek a kdekoľvek :-)

- Premeňte svoj mobil či tablet na knihu. Len si vyberte tú pravú z vašej knižnice na Martinus a ihneď sa môžete pustiť do jej čítania. Čítať môžete aj bez pripojenia na internet!

- Počúvate audioknihy? Tie zakúpené na Martinus môžete počúvať priamo z aplikácie

- V posteli, či na pláži? Nezáleží na tom, kde a ako čítate, aplikáciu si viete prispôsobiť tak, aby ste sa mohli sústrediť na to najdôležitejšie - vašu knihu.

- Zvýraznite si vo vašej knihe dôležité pasáže, alebo myšlienky, na ktoré nechcete zabudnúť. Záložkou si tiež viete označiť strany alebo miesta v audioknihe, ku ktorým sa chcete vrátiť.

- Učebnica zo školy, alebo e-kniha, ktorú ste si kúpili inde? Uložte si ich a čítajte u nás! Podporujeme všetky e-knihy vo formáte EPUB a PDF.

KUBO - detské knihy - čítanie pre deti

Čítajte, učte sa a zabávajte. Kubo je digitálna knižnica pre deti s tisíckami e-kníh, ktoré potešia nielen vaše oči. Rozprávky, príbehy, encyklopédie, riekanky. S Kubom majú deti vždy čo čítať!

O KUBOVI

Kubo, to je digitálna knižnica, obsahujúca tisícky detských kníh v atraktívnom modernom grafickom spracovaní. Apka je dizajnovaná pre deti od 2 rokov, so zameraním na predškolákov a mladších školákov. Odteraz bude mať vaša rodina vždy poruke kvalitnú knižku na čítanie. Beletriu a aj náučnú literatúru vo forme obrázkových encyklopédií môžete čítať neobmedzene, kamkoľvek pôjdete.

KUBO - detská knižnica vrátane štyroch detských užívateľských profilov s nastaveniami veku a záujmov stojí len €7,99/mesiac.

Čo KUBO obsahuje

- originálne rozprávky
- moderné rozprávky od domácich aj svetových autorov
- encyklopédie a obrázkové knihy
- didaktické knižky, ktoré naučia dieťa novým schopnostiam
- básničky, riekanky od klasických slovenských autorov na precvičovanie jazýčka

Výhody KUBA

- nikdy sa nekončiace čítanie vždy poruke
- nové publikácie každý deň
- odporúčaná literatúra podľa veku a záujmov dieťaťa
- šetrí životné prostredie

Príklady kníh, ktoré v KUBOvi nájdete:
Andrea Gregušová - Gréta
Ján Uličiansky - Analfabeta Negramotná
Gabriela Futová - Očko špehúň, Očko špehúň 2. Čo nám dedo nikdy neprezradil
Erik Jakub Groch - Píšťalkár, Tuláčik a Klára
Karel Čapek - Dášenka
Josef Čapek - O psíčkovi a mačičke
Dorota Hošovská - Ezopove bájky
Miroslava Gurguľová - Varíkovci
... a tisícky ďalších!

„S tou aplikací je super práce mezi zařízeními!“ - Tomáš Macháček

„Úžasná appka, teraz "prečítam" knihu aj pri chôdzi, behu alebo inej činnosti pri ktorej nemôžem byť ponorený do stránok.“ - Patrik Patoraj

Co získáte instalací naší aplikace? 
- Možnost vybrat si z katalogu více než 13000 audioknih. Detektivky, historie, osobní rozvoj, filozofie, fantasy, sci-fi... přijdete si na své.
- Největší katalog českých a slovenských podcastů na webu, které si můžete vybírat a přehrávat rovnou v appce. Zábava, novinky, informace, vzdělávání... volba je na vás.
- Neobvykle dlouhé ochutnávky - žádný zajíc v pytli, hezky si poslechněte, co kupujete.
- Pohodlné přehrávání a synchronizaci mezi zařízeními. Posloucháte na telefonu a chcete pokračovat na tabletu? Aplikace si sama pamatuje, kde jste skončili.
- Časovač vypnutí - jste moc unavení a do pár minut usnete? Aplikace se sama vypne v čas, který si určíte. Usínáte, ale ještě byste poslouchali déle? Tak prostě ťukněte do telefonu a počítadlo se resetuje. 
- Záložky - přehrávejte si oblíbené části pořád dokola... klidně až do zbláznění.
- Pak taky umí salta, přemety, kliky... no dobře, tak neumí, ale má spoustu dalších funkcí.

A co dalšího? Aplikace je propojená s nejmilejším obchodem s audioknihami. Naše jméno je Audiolibrix. A kromě široké nabídky audioknih a skvělé aplikace zdarma máme i super blog, podcast o audioknihách a hlavně skvělou podporu.

Navíc na webu i v appce najdete největší katalog českých a slovenkých podcastů. Můžete si tak vybrat své oblíbené kousky, které vám třeba zlepší pracovní den. A poslouchat rovnou v appce.

Takže co vám jako Audiolibrix všechno nabídneme? 
1) Úžasné audioknihy
2) Zajímavé podcasty
3) Bezvadnou podporu
4) Skvělou aplikaci 
5) Přátelské prostředí 
6) Akce, parádní nabídky
7) Kopec zábavy a zajímavých informací
8) Osmička, co byla osmička... audioknihy, podcasty, podpora, aplikace, komunikace, akce, zábava... ne... nemůžeme si vzpomenout. Ale určitě je to něco super!

Hundreds of enchanting stories brimming with surprises, entertainment, and wisdom, elevated by a captivating audio adventure for kids. When you read aloud, the app responds to your voice with delightful sounds and music. For a child, this is a wondrous audio journey, free from any screen time.

REASONS WHY YOU’LL LOVE READMIO
— We help build a positive attitude towards reading
— We create stories with the intention of supporting the mental and emotional development of children
— Our stories are short and easy to integrate with other activities
— Reading with sounds works offline and with your privacy in mind
— We add new stories every week
— It’s fun not only for your children but for you as well

LISTEN TO AUDIOBOOKS
— Stories and fairy tales also include audiobooks. This is handy when you can’t read or while driving.
— Your presence while listening to audiobooks has a positive effect. If you also maintain physical contact (holding hands, stroking the head), it’s even better.

CREATE YOUR OWN AUDIOBOOKS
— Each fairy tale or story you read aloud can be recorded and automatically transformed into your very own audiobook! With just one click.
— You can listen to the audiobooks while travelling in the car or children can listen to your voice when you are away.
— Audiobooks you create can be shared with your family or friends.

COLOURING AND MORE
— Stories include colouring pages you can print and let your children color them. It’s a great activity children can do while you read to them or the next day.
— You can also print any story and read it without the phone.

BY PARENTS FOR PARENTS
Readmio is an app full of fairy tales that we have enriched with sounds. Just download the app, save a story to the library and start reading! While you read out loud, the app follows along and adds sounds at exactly the right moment. You don’t have to worry about anything, just read at a regular speed and our application will listen to you and enhance your experience. That’s it. For best results, don’t read too fast and avoid noisy environments (e.g. in the car).

A SMALL THEATRE AT HOME
Feel free to put even more into the storytelling, our sounds and music will help you. For example, try making different voices or facial expressions and make a small home theater for your children. Your acting performance is very important for the whole experience. Some parents even prefer to use a Bluetooth speaker to make the sounds and music create a colorful atmosphere throughout the whole room.

WHY THERE AREN’T ANY ILLUSTRATIONS IN THE STORIES?
The fairy tales have beautiful cover illustrations that will help you and your children choose what you are going to read. However, the children's contact with the mobile phone should end there. In the stories themselves, we did not include illustrations intentionally because we do not want to support their time spent in front of the screen. It is better to draw children's attention to you, the sounds, and the story itself.

MEANINGFUL STORIES
We created Readmio because we believe in the power of stories. They form the basis of society and help to spread and maintain wisdom. For children, they are an ideal tool not only for expanding vocabulary but also for explaining complicated topics. We recommend that you use our stories as a conversation starter for topics you care about. You will find inspiration on how to get started in the descriptions of the individual stories.

ABOUT PRIVACY
An internet connection is required to download the fairy tale, but not for the reading itself. Speech recognition works completely offline on your device. No data or voice recordings are stored or transferred anywhere. Your privacy comes first. In addition, you can read on the go or abroad without worrying about expensive roaming charges.

We believe that you and your little ones will enjoy the application and have many magical experiences together.

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:

Discover stories that matter to you, from readers like you. Goodreads is the world's largest community of readers.

Find new and interesting books by browsing personalized recommendations based on books you've read and your favorite genres. See what your friends are reading, write book reviews, and keep track of what you want to read. Goodreads is a free service for book tracking, recommendations and reviews.

Use our barcode scanner the next time you are in a bookstore. Add the book in your hands to your "Want To Read" shelf and browse reviews before buying.

Features:

• Get personalized recommendations and discover new books based on your tastes.
• Goodreads Choice Awards: vote for your favorite books of the year and see the winners!
• Participate in the Reading Challenge!
• Book cover and barcode scanner!
• Keep a want-to-read list.
• See book reviews and updates from your friends.
• Discover new books and explore popular book lists.
• Rate and review books you read.
• Share notes and progress updates as you read.
• Recommend books to friends.
• Join online book clubs and connect with other readers.

By using this app, you agree to Goodreads’s Terms of Use (https://www.goodreads.com/about/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://www.goodreads.com/about/privacy).

NovelTime - Your Pocket Library for Reading Novels & Books! 

Transform every spare moment into a reading adventure with romance novels, love stories and fiction books at your fingertips. Perfect for coffee breaks, commutes, or any time you want to read novels online.

Romance & Fiction Book Collection
Discover romance novels, love stories, mystery books and short fiction from around the world. Read ebooks in various genres including romantic novels, adventure stories and more.

Multi-Language Reading
Break language barriers and read books from global authors. Novels and stories available in multiple languages.

Extensive Library
Many romance books and fiction novels available. Find your next favorite story to read online.

Comfortable Book Reader Experience
Carefully designed ebook reader for immersive novel reading. Adjust settings for your perfect reading comfort.

Whether you're a romance novel enthusiast or just discovering the joy of reading books online, NovelTime transforms your moments into enriching reading experiences. Perfect for busy professionals, students, or anyone who loves reading stories and novels.

Romance novels, fiction books, stories to read. NovelTime, your pocket novel reader and ebook library.

Download now and begin reading novels online - where every moment becomes a gateway to amazing romance stories, fiction books and unforgettable characters!

Listen to audiobooks in our new, more convenient mobile application. Log in to your account and try it now!

Audioteka is a free app, where you can download or listen to audiobooks directly from your device. We offer you a possibility to listen free chapters, buy, download and listen to bestsellers wherever you are. The app allows you to find thousands of audiobooks on Fiction, Non-fiction, Arts & Entertainment, Biography and Autobiography, Business, Children, Classics, Crime & Thrillers, Science - Fiction & Fantasy, Health & Personal Development, Young Adult, Podcasts & Newspapers and many more.

The Audioteka application is in short:

- the ability to create a list of favorite items

- integration with Apple CarPlay
- Google Chromecast support
- access to your shelf
- the ability to easily recommend and share content with friends
- offline listening to previously downloaded content
- snooze function (auto-turn off the audiobook)
- option to set the speed of listening to the audiobook (from 0.5 up to 2x faster)
- possibility to rate audiobooks
- the ability to listen to podcasts and broadcasts
- constant help and customer service

More features coming soon!

If your shelf is empty, because you do not have an account at Audioteka yet, listen to the free broadcasts and podcasts that we have included in the new version of the application.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Audioknihy a e-knihy pohodlně vždy po ruce ve vašem telefonu a tabletu. Nová verze aplikace přináší vylepšený vzhled, přepracované ovládání a mnoho dalšího.
 
• na úvodní obrazovce můžete hned po startu aplikace pokračovat ve čtení či poslechu jedním poklepáním
• procházení vaší knihovny médií přehlednější než kdy předtím
• přehrávač audioknih s informacemi o titulu a zapamatováním rozposlouchané pozice
• audioknihy s podporou streamování (není nutné stáhnout celou kapitolu či audioknihu předem)
• možnost jednoduchého stažení libovolného obsahu pro offline čtení či poslech i mimo signál
• rychlejší reakce na vaše podněty
• možnost volby světlého / tmavého / automatického režimu
• uzpůsobeno pro telefon i tablet

Čtěte a poslouchejte kdykoliv a kdekoliv se svou osobní knihovnou Luxor!

Vytvořte si vlastní knihovnu e-obsahu s mobilní aplikací Můj Luxor. Mějte svou sbírku audioknih a e-knih z Luxor.cz vždy po ruce a užívejte si čtení či poslech v intuitivním prostředí. Navíc můžete kdykoliv pokračovat přesně tam, kde jste skončili.

Nejste si jistí, zda vás kniha zaujme? Žádný problém! Přečtěte si ukázku nebo si ji poslechněte a rozhodněte se s jistotou. To stojí za vyzkoušení, nemyslíte?

Jak to funguje?

Pokud jste si knihu pořídili na Luxor.cz, stačí se přihlásit do aplikace svým zákaznickým účtem a váš zakoupený e-obsah na vás už bude čekat ve vaší knihovně.

Co vám aplikace přinese?

 • Přehlednou knihovnu e-obsahu zakoupeného na Luxor.cz 
 • Kompletní katalog audioknih a e-knih
 • Možnost vyzkoušení díky ukázkám ke čtení i poslechu
 • Intuitivní přehrávač audioknih a pohodlnou čtečku e-knih
 • Offline režim, takže si knihy užijete i bez připojení
 • Propojení s účtem Luxor.cz pro snadnou správu vaší knihovny

A to není vše! Neustále pracujeme na nových funkcích, které vám přinesou ještě lepší zážitek.

V Luxoru žijí knihy – pojďte to zažít!

Aplikácia „Liturgické čítania“ je určená najmä pre katolíkov, ktorí chcú mať rýchly prístup ku aktuálnym liturgickým textom čítaných počas bohoslužieb. Je dobrou pomôckou k rozjímaniu nad biblickým liturgickým textom a príprave na sväté omšu. Odporúčame ju nielen kňazom a lektorom, ale všetkým veriacim, ktorí chcú mať väčší duchovný úžitok z bohoslužby slova vo svätej omši.

Užívateľ v nej nájde:
- informáciu o stupni liturgického slávenia príslušného dňa
- liturgické čítania daného dňa aj s ich kontextom
- životopis svätca / svätcov dňa
- komentáre k nedeľným čítaniam

Aplikácia ďalej ponúka zobrazenie liturgického kalendára po mesiacoch a zoznam svätých s možnosťou ich vyhľadávania.

V aplikácii je integrovaná funkcia čítania textu.Texty sú publikované s vedomím Konferencie biskupov Slovenska ako pracovná verzia.Copyright 2020 © Katolícke biblické dielo na Slovensku.Kontakt: kbd@kbd.sk

Texty sú publikované s vedomím Konferencie biskupov Slovenska ako pracovná verzia.

Copyright 2020 © Katolícke biblické dielo na Slovensku.
Kontakt: kbd@kbd.sk

Aplikácia je určená na prípravu slávenia svätých omší a nenahrádza platne vydané a schválené liturgické texty.
V aplikácii sa nachádzajú:
- formuláre sv. omší spracované podľa Direktória (liturgický kalendár),
- liturgické čítania,
- spoločné modlitby veriacich,
- prefácie,
- eucharistické modlitby,
- požehnania nad ľudom,
- slávnostné požehnanie,
- omše za zmierenie, zosnulých a o Najsvätejšom Srdci Ježišovom,
- spoločné omše preblahoslavenej Panny Márie,
- odpovede v cudzích jazykoch.
Túto aplikáciu vyvíjame vo svojom voľnom čase a bez nároku na honorár. Ak sa vám aplikácia páči, šírte ju prosím ďalej. Zároveň vás prosíme o modlitby za nás a toto dielo.

Čtěte kteroukoliv knihu chcete, kdekoliv chcete a jakkoliv chcete.
BOOKPORT je moderní on-line knihovna a první české předplatné na knihy v ČR a SR. 

Získejte neomezený přístup k více než 9 500 titulům, včetně nejnovějších bestsellerů za cenu jedné knihy. Vybírejte z tisíce titulů od beletrie, přes populárně naučnou až po odbornou literaturu.

Aplikace vám přináší:
- Neomezené čtení knih
- Nabídku titulů od předních českých nakladatelů
- Týdenní aktualizace a rozšiřování nabídky
- Možnost číst off-line na cestách
- Možnost přizpůsobit si text, velikost písma, noční režim a další
- Možnost vytvářet si vlastní kolekce knih
a další

Ponořte se s námi do světa knih

[Enjoy Novelmates]

All the books that you love. On the page or out loud. Anywhere you are.

Dive into a world of stories with Google Play Books! Explore millions of eBooks, audiobooks, comics and manga – all in one app.

Key Features: 
• Your library, anywhere: Enjoy books on your phone, tablet, computer or even in your car with CarPlay. Plus, you can download books to read offline.

• Organise with shelves: Personalise your digital library with custom shelves to categorise your books by genre, author or any theme that you’d like.

• Audio immersion: Enjoy a vast library of audiobooks with customisable playback speed, sleep timers and bookmarking to enhance your listening experience.

• Smart notes: Jot down notes while you read that sync with your Google Drive and can be shared for easy collaboration.

• Kid-friendly reading tools: Let kids explore word definitions or listen to books aloud. Note: Reading tools are available in English only.

• Immersive comics: Experience Bubble Zoom for a specialised comic and manga reading experience.

• Hands-free reading: Control your audiobook with your voice using Siri.

• Read your way: Customise your reading experience by adjusting the font, text size, brightness and more.

Millions of stories await on Google Play Books! Download now and start reading.

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodNovel Bundle to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

MotoNovel is an innovative and user-friendly reading application, wholeheartedly committed to providing users with a wide range of high-quality collections of novel resources. This application is meticulously designed with the sole purpose of presenting users with truly outstanding and fascinating novel stories.

Ha neked is vannak üres óráid és szeretnél hasznos hanganyagokat hallgatni, utazás, sport vagy házimunka közben, akkor a VOIZ hangoskönyvtárat neked találták ki!

Az alkalmazást ingyen ki tudod próbálni, időkorlát nélkül!

A VOIZ hangoskönyvtárban hangoskönyveket hallgathatsz és vásárolhatsz.

Ingyenes használat esetén belehallgathatsz bármelyik könyv elejébe.
Ha ezután megteszik a hangoskönyv, megvásárolhatod az alkalmazásban.

A jövőben készülünk teljesen ingyenesen meghallgatható könyvekkel is!

Folyamatosan készítünk új hangoskönyveket. A jelenleg készülő hangoskönyvek elsősorban üzleti, motivációs és önfejlesztő könyvek.

Célunk, hogy rövid időn belül önfejlesztő, pszichológia és spirituális könyvek kerüljenek fel az applikációba, hogy bárki aki fejlődni szeretne az élete egy területén, az megtehesse azt. Legyen ez akár a párkapcsolata javítása, gyermeke nevelése, üzlete fellendítése, vagy kapcsolata a transzcendenssel. 

Természetesen az alkalmazásban megtalálhatóak szépirodalmi könyvek is, aki ezeket kedveli inkább.

A szülőkre gondolva pedig tervbe van, hogy a mesekönyv szekciót is kibővítjük.

Nagy izgalommal és szeretettel fejlesztjük neked az applikációt és azon vagyunk, hogy a lehető legjobb élmény legyen hangoskönyveket hallgatnod!

Emiatt nagyon várjuk a visszajelzésedet. Az alkalmazáson belül, a menünél, a "Kérdésed van? Írj nekünk!" menüpontban tudsz nekünk írni.

Várjuk az ötleteidet, hogy:
- milyen funkciókat fejlesszünk az applikációba
- milyen könyveket hallgatnál szívesen

Bármilyen megjegyzést szívesen veszünk, ne habozz nekünk írni!

Hasznos időtöltést kíván a VOIZ csapata!

Ui: Ha van egy könyved vagy te adsz ki könyveket és szeretnéd, ha a könyveid bekerüljenek az appba, ne habozz felkeresni minket! (Akár arra is lehetőséged van, hogy mi készítjük el neked a hanganyagot)

Uii: Sok követőd van, akik nyitottak az önfejlesztésre? Akkor írj nekünk, mert remek affiliate/parnter programunk van, amivel könnyen kialakíthatsz jelentős passzív jövedelmet. Ajánlj minket és mi nem leszünk szűkmarkúak!

Wild Symphony is an augmented reality experience that takes you on an exciting musical adventure with Maestro Mouse and his symphonic friends! Just download the app and point it at any illustration in the picture book, and you’ll hear the corresponding song. Travel through the trees and across the seas as you listen to orchestral music inspired by big blue whales and speedy cheetahs, tiny beetles and graceful swans.

Transform your reading and story time with this AR-based musical accompaniment. A unique picture book experience like none you've ever heard!

Wild Symphony is designed for imaginative children of all ages. The app:
• Allows readers to listen to the picture book’s musical accompaniment.
• Plays audio recordings of orchestral music composed by author Dan Brown
• Features beautiful illustrations from artist Susan Batori

Bring a fun new dynamic to the picture book with this intuitive AR app that adds an exciting soundtrack and encourages newfound love and appreciation of music.

• Litres: Books - a huge library in Estonian, English, Lithuanian, Latvian, Russian and other languages. 
• All the latest international bestsellers 
• The #1 reading app in the App Store 
• Over 10 million of happy customers
• The largest catalog — over 250,000 books 
Welcome to Litres! It’s a great way to read your favorite books on your iPhone or iPad.

 
For you:

· Access to 600,000 books and audiobooks in your favorite genres: fantasy, science fiction, business, Russian literature, DIY, romance, mystery, action, business, self-improvement, psychology, and much more.
· The first 20% of any book is free. What if you don’t like it? Read and choose which books to get.
· The hottest new releases. Be the first! Most new releases appear in the Litres catalog at the same time the paper book is released.
· Over 32,000 free books — read to your heart's content!
· Enter regularly-scheduled drawings and win valuable prizes for registered Litres users.
 
Special features:

· Your books are always with you — all the books you have purchased are available to you on all your devices (as long as you use the same account)
· Start reading on your iPhone, pick up where you left off on your iPad! All your bookmarks will be synced across all your devices and the Litres online reader (as long as you use the same account)
· The convenient search function lets you search for books based on various criteria. Do you only know the author's last name? Or are you trying to find a new fantasy novel to read? Our search function can help!
· You can sign up in a single tap using your social network account
 
To select a book:

· Read large free excerpts before you buy the book (up to 20% of the book)
· Read book reviews by other users or write your own
· Study the author's official web page with biographies, critiques, and easy access to series of books
 
While reading, you can:

· add the pages you need to your bookmarks
· see how many pages you’ve read and how many you have left
· fine-tune your reading experience for maximum comfort — adjust book background, screen brightness, and font size
· access your entire library in offline mode even when roaming or outside a network area (you will have to download the books beforehand)
· enable nighttime reading mode with a single button
  
If you like a book, you can:

· buy it with a single tap or put it in your cart and buy it later from your current device or a different one
· share information about the book with your friends on a social network
 
Get access to the best books and read online. Enjoy authors such as:

Boris Akunin, E. L. James, Alexandra Marinina, Sergei Lukyanenko, Darya Dontsova, Dina Rubina, Tatyana Ustinova, Roman Zlotnikov, Jojo Moyes, Tatyana Polyakova, George R. R. Martin, Vadim Panov, Sergei Tarmashev, Dmitrii Glukhovsky, Elena Zvyozdnaya, Stephen King, Max Frye, Maria Metlitskaya, Oleg Roi, Andrei Kruz, Yekaterina Vilmont, Donna Tartt, Zakhar Prilepin, Artyom Kamenisty, Dan Brown, Viktor Pelevin, James Rollins, Robert Galbraith, Vadim Zeland, Dmitrii Bykov, Alexander Mazin, Erich Maria Remarque, Anna and Sergei Litvinov, Natalya Zhiltsova, Dmitrii Rus, Jo Nesbø, Anna Gavrilova, Irene Kao, Viktoria Tokareva, Alexander Pushkin, Anton Chekhov, Fyodor Dostoevsky, Leo Tolstoy, Ivan Turgenev. Most popular books - Anna Karenina, War and Peace, Crime and Punishment, The Brothers Karamazov, Fathers and Sons.
 
Note: the Litres app may collect anonymous usage statistics.
